backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, lease listings, and lease requests with access control and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing required UI additions, asset usage, and text updates for app download sections.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their components, pages, and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, global layout, routes, theme provider, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Displays the logged‑in user's name in a badge after profile retrieval.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their profile name after authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Route guard that shows a sign‑in prompt for unauthenticated users and renders children when logged in.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Incomi: Displays incoming lease requests for an owner with status badges and actions to accept or reject requests.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LeaseO: Dialog for creating or editing lease listings with form inputs and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OwnerO: Shows the owner's lease listings with options to create, edit, or archive listings.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main application layout with top navigation and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with links, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/leases/EmptyStat: Reusable empty state card displaying a title and description.
frontend/src/components/leases/LeaseList: Card view of a single lease listing with details and link to its page.
frontend/src/components/marketing/GetUni: Section promoting the Unity Network mobile app with store links and branding.
frontend/src/components/media/YouTubeSho: Displays a grid of YouTube Shorts cards using preset video IDs with titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TopNa: Implements a responsive top navigation bar with links, auth controls, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/requests/SubmitL: Provides a form for authenticated users to submit lease requests and handles submission state and errors.
frontend/src/components/requests/TenantR: Fetches and displays the user's lease requests in a table with statuses and submission dates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity data into a simplified auth helper exposing login, logout, and principal info.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseListings.ts: Exposes queries for fetching active and owner-specific lease listings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseRequests.ts: Provides query and mutation hooks for submitting and managing lease requests for tenants and owners.
frontend/src/hooks/useOwnerDashboard.ts: Defines mutations for creating, updating, and archiving lease listings and invalidates relevant queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Handles fetching and saving the authenticated user's profile using actor-backed queries and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables with base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the authenticated dashboard with tabs for offers, incoming requests, and user requests plus a media section.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains the app workflow with step cards, external resources, and details about ULO lease codes.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Provides the marketing landing page with hero section, CTAs, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseDetailsPage.tsx: Displays details for a specific lease listing with loading states, not-found handling, and a request submission form.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseListingsPage.tsx: Shows active lease listings with sorting, loading skeletons, and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with message and link back to the homepage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and persist or clear parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, requirements, constraints, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for an ICP‑based UNO/ULO lease site.
